item.title: SeaVoice Discord Bot Helps Moderators;Segment your Customers in Bulk Messaging Outreach
item.description: In this edition: [Product] SeaVoice STT/TTS Discord Bot gives Moderators More Control over Voice Channel [Product] Segment Your Customers in Bulk Messaging with Labels SeaVoice STT/TTS Discord Bot gives Moderators More Control over Voice Channel The SeaVoice Discord bot introduces two exciting new commands to tailor its use to your preference!

item.title: Discord TTS Case Study;Chinese Support for Discord Bot;NearMe Push Messages
item.description: In this edition: [Product] Text-to-Speech Discord Bot Case Study [Product] SeaVoice Discord Bot Supports Chinese [Highlight] Capture Users After They Leave Webchats with Near Me Messaging Text-to-Speech Discord Bot Case Study Our SeaVoice Discord bot has now been added to nearly 800 servers, and is used daily to provide STT and TTS to Discord users.
